interface.name: org.freedesktop.ModemManager1.Sim
interface.tp:docstring: Handles communication with SIM, USIM, and RUIM (CDMA SIM) cards.

method.name: SendPuk
method.tp:docstring: Send the PUK and a new PIN to unlock the SIM card.

method.name: SendPin
method.tp:docstring: Send the PIN to unlock the SIM card.

method.name: EnablePin
method.tp:docstring: Enable or disable the PIN checking.

property.name: SimIdentifier
property.tp:docstring: An obfuscated SIM identifier based on the IMSI or the ICCID. This may be available before the PIN has been entered depending on the device itself.

property.name: Imsi
property.tp:docstring: The IMSI of the SIM card, if any.

property.name: OperatorId
property.tp:docstring: The ID of the network operator that issued the SIM card, formatted as a 5 or 6-digit MCC/MNC code (e.g. "310410").

property.name: OperatorName
property.tp:docstring: The name of the network operator, as given by the SIM card, if known.
